name: The Big Man of Purgatory
description:
Keep the Big Man of Purgatory alive by feeding him his favourite meals while he wages chaos on the world!

Made for Ludum Dare 46 theme 'Keep it Alive' - The Big Man of Purgatory Is about working as a servant of a chaotic god. As the Big Man wages war in the overworld, delicious heroes will join you in his purgatory domain. 

As the game progresses, the Big Man will take damage from battles. Feed him his desired meals to keep him alive!

But beware - he will grow impatient and look to make you work harder if he sees you slacking.

Can be played with a keyboard (WASD to move) or an Xbox gamepad.
